name: indexOfDaisyui
description:
Get index of https://daisyui.com.
	Before accessing the getDocumentOfDaisyui tool, please call this tool first to get the list of pages.
	If the content is too long, you can use the `max_length` and `start_index` parameters to limit the content.

max_length.description: The max length of the index to return

start_index.description: The starting index of the index to return

name: getDocumentOfDaisyui
description:
Get page contents belonging to https://daisyui.com.
	Before accessing this tool, please call the indexOfDaisyui tool first to get the list of pages.
	This tool will return the content of the page from subpath.
	If the content is too long, you can use the `max_length` and `start_index` parameters to limit the content.

subpath.description: The subpath of the page to return

max_length.description: The max length of the content to return

start_index.description: The starting index of content to return
